name: You Don’t Trust Me At All
content: You don't trust me at all
You don't love me anymore
我正等著你回答我
You don't trust me at all
You don't love me anymore
其实你不用急著敷衍我
从来不曾要求 你为我做什么
只要你一直抱著我
说你不了解我 但至少会去试著做
去喜欢 每个我
You don't trust me at all
You don't love me anymore
我正等著你反驳我
You don't trust me at all
You don't love me anymore
以前你都会对我说没有
